package.name: open-toutatice
package.title: Open Toutatice
package.description:
This addon implements the opened platform called Open Toutatice (which one is based on the Nuxeo DM distribution)
_________________________________________________________________
Main new features:
* Generalization of opentoutatice's ids - every document has a technical id (except remote proxies for the moment: they have only cms path) - only admins can change id's values - CRUD by id integrated in REST API * Web mode moved in external addon * Exclusive Contribute permission: only leaf document's creator can modify or delete it * TiniyMCE: - possibility to insert download link when inserting link to File document - possibility to insert link to remote proxy * By default, every Folderish is shown in Portal menu * New EraseModifications operation allowing to come back to last
Other features:
* New Multiple upload files widget * Notifications: - getUserFullName method - specific documentLocallyPublished event
_________________________________________________________________
Main bug fixes:
* #873: Works of Asynchronous listeners done in silent mode * #6933: References passed in createOp chain to be able to execute many chains on same event (event-handler) * #1159: check of unicity of id on imports / possibility to shutdown recursion on ids setting
Other bug fixes:
* #1206: Access of documents in content view cv_ContentOrderedReadNWrite managed by Elasticsearch * property tabOrder of Publish Spaces pre-filled to avoid ElasticSearch parsing Exception * #1182: conditions on Portal Configuration tab * Get allowed configurations * #1152, #961: fix move and reorder of local proxies * New definition of validationWorkflow_validation permission * Visibility of toutatice_widget_tab_order * Fixes possible nullPointer on Nx start up in ToutaticeDocumentHelper * #1166: errors bindings on JSF components * ttc_richtext_with_mimetype: fix of empty field definition or empty field for changeable document
